content: this pattern is also available for free here https //spinayarncrochet com/candy-corn-amigurumi-free-crochet-pattern/ get ready for spooky season with a quick and fun festive candy corn amigurumi you don t have to like eating them to enjoy making them d you can use any worsted weight yarn to create this cutie the pattern uses cotton but any material will work for a bigger or smaller candy corn simply size up or down in yarn size and adjust your hook accordingly
